field.name: focus_border
field.descr:
Image button's focus border.
Defaults to \ref focus_border_appearance "INSERT_LIBX_NAMESPACE::w::focus_border_appearance::base::theme()", and can be set to visible_theme()

field.name: images
field.descr:
Checkbox images
Specifies filenames the checkbox images get loaded from. \note Filenames without a path component get searched for in the current display theme's directory, and NOT the current directory. All images' sizes should be the same
